---

title: "env"

description: "Output environment variabls values"

---



## Usage

```bash
omni env <SUBCOMMAND>
```

---

## Subcommands

- [`get`](./get) - Retrieves the value of an environment variable

- [`all`](./all) - Retrieves all environment variables

---

## Examples

```bash
omni env <SUBCOMMAND>
```

---
